name: Sole Meuniere
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow bowl, stir together the milk and Tabasco sauce. Place the flour in a shallow dish and season with 2 teaspoons of salt and pepper to taste. Melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Dip the sole in the milk and then coat on both sides with the flour mixture.

Saute the fish until just cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Carefully remove from the skillet with a spatula and place 1 fillet on each of 4 plates. Lower the heat, add the lemon juice to the skillet and stir just to scrape up any browned bits in the skillet. Spoon over the fish, season with salt and pepper to taste and sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately.
